Level.Name: Easy
Level.Description: Simple level with 3 pieces of evidence to find. Be careful with your steps, running to the first you see may be reckless!

D0.Line: theBigCheese> Hey rookie. I hear its your first time on the job.
theBigCheese> I'll guide you through this one.
theBigCheese> Basically, you're looking for evidence at the scene of the crime.
theBigCheese> Hold on a minute, my secretary is talking to me.
theBigCheese> Nevermind, I gotta go. Ned, help them.
Forensics4Life> Just move around and grab evidence samples.
Forensics4Life> Click spaces next to you (the 'i') to move.
Forensics4Life> If you land on a sample, you'll pick it up.
not_a_secret_agent4242> Don't screw it up, rookie.
Forensics4Life> Oh, and you have limited movement before we run out of time so watch that.
